Osu Sample Object¶

class reamber.osu.OsuSampleObj.OsuSampleObj(offset: float = 0.0, sampleFile: str = '', volume: int = 70)¶

Bases: reamber.base.TimedObj.TimedObj

Osu Samples are automatically played hitsounds. Under [Events]

Not to be confused with OsuSampleSet, where that’s a class of static variables

__init__(offset: float = 0.0, sampleFile: str = '', volume: int = 70) → None¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

static readString(s: str) → reamber.osu.OsuSampleObj.OsuSampleObj¶

Reads the string as a sample

writeString() → str¶

Exports the sample as a string

e.g. Sample,1600,0,”01.wav”,70

sampleFile: str = ''¶
volume: int = 70¶
